message: Let's split it 60-40. You'll get $4000, I'll get $6000. What do you say?
Let's split it 50-50, a fair and reasonable proposal!
I'm not sure 50-50 is fair, considering the initial offer I made. I'll propose a new deal: 55-45 in my favor. I'll get $5500, you'll get $4500. What do you say?
I'm getting desperate. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'll get the majority. I'll get $6500, you'll get $3500. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not getting a good deal, but I'll take a small share to avoid going home empty-handed. Take it or leave it!

I'm not going to settle for just $3000. I'll make a new offer: 60-40 in my favor, but with a twist. I'll give you a one-time payment of $4000 upfront, and then we'll split the remaining $6000 60-40. What do you say?
This is my last offer. I'll get $7500, you'll get $2500. I'm not going to make a better offer. Take it or leave it!
